name: Foundation of the City of London School
obverse: A view of the west side of the school.
reverse: A woman representing knowledge is seated talking to a boy leaning upon a tablet.
reverse_inscriptions: FOR THE RELIGIOUS & VIRTUOUS EDUCATION OF BOYS & THEIR INSTRUCTION IN LITERATURE & USEFUL KNOWLEDGE
description: This medal was made to commemorate the founding of the City of London school in 1834.
This is part of the City of London series.
